Title: User intent classification
introduction:
We participated in Mintlify's hackathon this weekend and launched an open-source project for user intent classification. This tool can be used to identify user intents in chatbots or other conversational AI projects. 

 For more details, please visit our [Github repository](https://github.com/Keywords-AI/keywordsai_eval).

New.description: Added a 'Logs' column showing the number of logs per thread.
Introduced sorting option for threads based on log count.
Added refresh and auto-refresh buttons to the Logs page.

Improved.description: Enhanced notification messages for a better user experience.
Updated Dashboard refresh and auto-refresh interface.
Improved loading time, it's 2x faster now.

Fixed.description: Resolved an issue where the playground was incorrectly caching identical LLM requests.
